Te Pāti Māori co-leader Debbie Ngarewa-Packer flips report critical of Rawiri Waititi back on Government https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/te-pati-maori-co-leader-debbie-ngarewa-packer-flips-report-ritic-of-rawiri-waititi-back-on-government/ EO6I5NX6MRGC3AEXJUQZYHOVPI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/te-pati-maori-co-leader-debbie-ngarewa-packer-flips-report-ritic-of-rawiri-waititi-back-on-government/ EO6I5NX6MRGC3AEXJUQZYHOVPI/ Thomas CoughlanParliament debated a report into what should happen to MPs who breach comity. Thu, 29 Aug 2024 06:15:43 +0000 Te Pāti Māori co-leader Debbie Ngarewa-Packer has accepted a report that was deeply critical of her co-leader Rawiri Waititi’s conduct in Parliament for failing to uphold the principle of comity. Photo / Mark Mitchell
